name: Wild Hunt
description:
This is my first time developing a VR game. I'm making an affordable VR game for Oculus Rift. It will have a lot of mechanics that are found in VR games that are too expensive.  Playtest various mechanics that I will develop along with levels. What started out as a Survival game turned into a target shooting game. I have climbing mechanics and other mechanics already built. I will release them in the future once I polish the shooting mechanics.

Thanks for the feedback.
